message.entry: MATLAB Connector is required to connect to your hardware.
If you already have MATLAB Connector installed, click Next.

MATLAB Connector is required to use your device with MATLAB Online. It allows your browser to interface with your computer and connect to your device. After you have enabled Hardware Connectivity in MATLAB Connector, you can establish communication and continue setting up your device.
MATLAB Connector is required to connect to your hardware.
To establish communication with MATLAB Connector, click Connect.
Failed to communicate with MATLAB Connector.
Try the following, then click Connect to proceed:
Make sure you have MATLAB Connector installed (click the link on the previous page).
Make sure you enable Hardware Connectivity in MATLAB Connector.
Make sure you click Open MATLAB Connector when it shows up in the browser.
Make sure you are signed on with the same MathWorks account in MATLAB Online as in MATLAB Connector.
To connect to MATLAB Connector, click Continue. You might be prompted for permission to open MATLAB Connector.

To download and install the required third-party tools, click Install. You will be installing the following which might contain open source software that might be under the terms of General Public License (GPL).
Install the third-party tools to proceed.
Downloading and installing the third-party tools...
Support package hardware setup is incomplete. Run the hardware setup screens.
Support package update detected. Run the hardware setup screens again.

To start setup screens:\n- Click the Add-Ons button in the sidebar on the left side of the MATLAB Online desktop to open the Add-Ons panel. Then, click the Options button next to the {0} add-on and select Setup.
Review all the licenses used as part of {0} before proceeding.
